title: Talon E
body: So its still called cutthroat when all it does is slow why not make it cancel channels like {{champion:38}} also when is his passive gonna get a rework?

replies.body: Slow? if you cut the throat you lose skin so technically they should gain a speed boost. of 0.01%.

It used to silence (cutthroat) but then got nerfed to a slow.
They didn't change the name... for some reason.

> [{quoted}](name=gr8artist,realm=NA,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=KEeYya9F,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-08-21T09:33:43.240+0000)
>
> It used to silence (cutthroat) but then got nerfed to a slow.
> They didn't change the name... for some reason.

I know this it was a 0.25 sec silence and riot removed it cause it wasn't "healthy" for an assassin to have a silence even if it was 0.25 sec
2 posts on this ... really? how about you just bump the first one
